DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Conducts a coordinated attack on a selected target location. All units are moved to a location near the target. They are then placed in formation, with armor and mech companies placed up front, artillery placed in the rear, and other units placed between. Once in position, the artillery will begin an indirect fire attack at the target. The other units will directly engage any enemy units in range.
